goal_name: A nation that ensures our food and nutrition security needs are adequately met for all people through increasing sustainable food production systems and improving household production
target_name: Increase agricultural and fisheries food production using sustainable practices to ensure sufficient access to affordable and nutritious food
indicator_name: Up to date data on primary production (agriculture, livestock, forestry, fisheries, biosecurity) available for analysis and informed decision-making and reporting
GoalDescription: A nation that ensures our food and nutrition security needs are adequately met for all people through increasing sustainable food production systems and improving household production
PolicyObjectiveDescription: Increase agricultural and fisheries food production using sustainable practices to ensure sufficient access to affordable and nutritious food
IndicatorDescription: Up to date data on primary production (agriculture, livestock, forestry, fisheries, biosecurity) available for analysis and informed decision-making and reporting
ComputationMethod:
•Collect information from DARD
•Data cleaning and analysis using excel
•Calculate percentage proportion of each primary production whether in agriculture, livestock, forestry, Etc… 
•Use Excel to produce graphs and charts as well
Concept: The concept will be to collect update data on primary production in agriculture, livestock, forestry, fisheries and biosecurity to analysis the data to see if there is an increase in agricultural and fisheries food production using sustainable practices to ensure sufficient access to affordable and nutritious food. If the target is achieved then we know that the NSDP goal is achieved which is A nation that ensures our food and nutrition security needs are adequately met for all people through increasing sustainable food production systems and improving household production
DataSource: Ministry of Agriculture, Livestock and Fisheries
Definition: Primary Production -The primary sector of the economy which includes any industry involved in primary production that is the extraction and collection of natural resources; such as farming, forestry, hunting, fishing and mining.
Dissaggregation: National Level,Provincial Level Type of Primary Sectors E.g., agriculture, livestock, forestry, fisheries, and biosecurity
Rationale: The purpose of this indicator study is to identify patterns and trends on the primary production in Vanuatu particularly in agriculture, livestock, forestry, fisheries, and biosecurity to measure increasing or decreasing primary production using sustainable practices which to ensure sufficient access to affordable and nutritious food for the Vanuatu population.
TargetDescription: To assist in Annual report and 6 monthly report supported by sector
graph_title: Up to date data on primary production (agriculture, livestock, forestry, fisheries, biosecurity) available for analysis and informed decision-making and reporting
